meet-your-inner-voice-description: Your unconscious mind has been running the show. These prompts help you finally hear what it's been trying to say.
first-thought-best-thought: First thought, best thought. Write whatever surfaces first. That's your unconscious speaking before your logical mind takes over.
no-wrong-answers: No wrong answers. Some days the words flow easily. Other days you might stare at the prompt thinking "I have no idea." Write that. Write whatever's there. It all counts.
patterns-emerge-slowly: Patterns emerge slowly. You're not looking for instant insights. You're building awareness, one day at a time.
this-space-is-yours-alone: This space is yours alone. Write freely.
this-is-your-time-to-pause-breathe-and-r: This is your time to pause, breathe, and reconnect with yourself.
find-a-quiet-comfortable-place-where-you: Find a quiet, comfortable place where you won't be interrupted.
for-the-best-experience-we-recommend-usi: For the best experience, we recommend using headphones.
when-you-re-ready-press-play-to-begin-yo: When you're ready, press play to begin your session with Dr. John O'Brien.
let-the-shift-begin-from-the-inside-out: Let the shift begin from the inside out.
movement-matters-description: Don't skip these 5 minutes! They might be the best ones of your day.
movement-matters-description-2: Each movement is designed to calm your nervous system, reset your energy, and gently support your transformation from the inside out.
movement-matters-description-3: Each breath, each stretch, is part of your shift.
